" ""My name is Volkov. You are leaving the system, is true? " "I also want to go and I would fly with you, if you're willing."" ) )

Volkov nods his head, more in relief than in joy.
"Good. I will see you out there!"

Volkov grimaces in disappointment and a profound grief fills his eyes. He begins to plead, but then turns away in resignation. As he walks away he whispers to himself: "Helena..."
